title: Weird Tick Noise Affects a Lot of Things
body: I was playing oneforall today and I couldn't type in chat, all I heard was 'tick' whenever I pressed a key, nothing I typed showed up. In game I was trying to open shop and heard that 'tick' again and I couldn't open shop, same thing happened with my spells, I wasn't able to cast them. I couldn't even type because of this everyone in my team reported me. If you have experienced this problem and know a way to fix it please tell me.

replies.body:
Could the 'tick' be coming from your keyboard itself?
Sounds like it's broken...
I have checked and it's not my keyboard, the sound is definetly coming from LoL.
